nodes.text: The Force Runs Strong is a two-page interview conducted by Pablo Hidalgo of comedian Chris Hardwick, appearing in Star Wars Insider 134. Hardwick discusses Course of the Force, an Olympic-style lightsaber relay run for charity that was held from July 7 to 11, 2012. In the interview Hardwick reveals that he has previously used Wookieepedia as a resource for his personal Star Wars research.
